column12: % of HHs whose dwelling enclosure provides adequate safety to the occupants, protection from exposure, and low risk of failure in predictable hazards
column13: % of HHs reporting to access their housing / shelter with security tenure
column14: % of HHs reporting having access to sufficient quantity of water to cover transversal needs (drinking, cooking, personal hygiene, domestic use)
column15: % of HHs reporting access to an improve sanitation facility
column16: % of HHs reporting access to soap
column17: % of HHs reporting decreased usage of Hygiene Items in the last 30 days
column18: % of the population identified as having disabilities
column19: % of households in which women and girls avoid areas because they feel unsafe there
column20: % HH missing at least one individual document
column21: % of HHs reporting issues when accessing assistance in the past 3 months
